pulfalight.title: Search results when a name is selected from the Names facet are confusing/duplicative

comments.body: Addressing the original question (redundant display), I wonder whether this could be addressed by a few small display changes. In a result screen looking like this: I feel like we could gain a lot by 1) repeating the search term directly above the search results, in black (it's currently showing in the facet button up and off to the left, gray) 2) stating "n search result(s)" (perhaps with "in" or ":") right above the collection link 3) adding in the entity's role with the target of the link, whether that target is a collection or a component, e.g. "creator of" Thinking out loud, I'm also wondering whether things would get clearer--perhaps not--if we unlinked the collection name at the top of the group? ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5940563/106341885-d8e7ec00-626c-11eb-8052-232fed5baa99.png)

**Resolved:** OAR is back up in [`5fa523b`](https://github.com/pulibrary/uptime/commit/5fa523b46091b45e89bb42c307fdd5d2d791da6f
).

**Resolved:** Confluence is back up in [`91e135e`](https://github.com/pulibrary/uptime/commit/91e135ee7f89917e8b231ce3b2e904ff2ae86bb0
).
